channel.title: Events on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Events on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Arohara : An E-Concert Series Presented By Murugan Temple of North America
item.description: AROHARA in an E-concert series organized by MTNA. This is a free concert series, however we welcome your donations at this difficult time where we all are affected. Your donations are tax-deductible. Donations could be made through the below PAYPAL link. Thank you for your continuous support to YOUR Murugan Temple Donation Amount: $ Checkout With PayPal -- Watch Arohara vol 3 Live Concert On YouTube Here
